name: HETEROTOPIAS
description: This photo is part of a series of analogue photographs based on the concept of heterotopia. Heterotopia is a concept elaborated by Michel Foucault to describe certain cultural, institutional and discursive spaces that are somehow ‘other’: disturbing, intense, incompatible, contradictory or transforming. Heterotopias are worlds within worlds, mirroring and yet upsetting what is outside.
